price: 9. Ô vous qui avez cru ! Lorsqu’il est appelé à la Çalât du vendredi, hâtez-vous pour évoquer Allah ! Laissez là tout commerce ! Cela est bien meilleur pour vous, si vous saviez !
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا نُودِيَ لِلصَّلَوٰةِ مِن يَوۡمِ ٱلۡجُمُعَةِ فَٱسۡعَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ ذِكۡرِ ٱللَّهِ وَذَرُواْ ٱلۡبَيۡعَۚ ذَٰلِكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū idhā nūdiya lilṣṣalati min yawmi al-jumuʿati fa-is'ʿaw ilā dhik'ri al-lahi wadharū al-bayʿa dhālikum khayrun lakum in kuntum taʿlamūna
